title: Soldiers of Bandari: The Chosen
description: Humanity believed itself to be the center of the Universe. Nothing could be further from the truth. Though Earth was caught off guard by the awakening, hope survived. Though extinction of the human race looked assured, heroes of old emerged from the ashes. Would others rise up under their tutelage in time to thwart the ultimate despot? This book features unrelenting characters, gripping battles, and a high-stakes story that will leave you on the edge of your seat.
author: Jason Luquis
